info.name: VaidyaCare Doctor Professional Details API
info.description: API collection for Doctor Professional Details

request.description: Get professional details for a doctor.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Professional details retrieved successfully",
    "data": {
        "doctor_id": 1,
        "doctor_mode": "Online",
        "primary_specialization": "General Medicine",
        "sub_specialization": "Internal Medicine",
        "experience_years": "12",
        "medical_license_number": "MH-12345-2013",
        "medical_council": "Maharashtra Medical Council",
        "qualifications": "MBBS, MD",
        "languages_spoken": "English, Hindi",
        "consultation_fee": "500.00"
    }
}

body.raw:
{
    "doctor_id": 1,
    "doctor_mode": "Online",
    "primary_specialization": "General Medicine",
    "sub_specialization": "Internal Medicine",
    "experience_years": "12",
    "medical_license_number": "MH-12345-2013",
    "medical_council": "Maharashtra Medical Council",
    "qualifications": "MBBS, MD",
    "languages_spoken": "English, Hindi",
    "consultation_fee": 500
}

request.description: Update professional details for a doctor.
